forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As night surrenders its hold, the city lies serenely beneath a quilt of partly cloudy skies. A whisper of cool air drifts in from the west, carrying with it the salty tang of the ocean, hinting at the refreshing clarity expected with the dawn. Tomorrow promises a canvas brushed with strokes of blue and gentle sunlight while still keeping an intimate distance from the warmer embrace of midday; temperatures will gracefully decline, inviting a layered approach to attire. A light jacket should suffice as you welcome the day—perfect for a leisurely stroll through the back alleys of the Mission or a peaceful moment spent outside a café, savoring a piping hot chai while people drift by.

As the day unfurls, the iconic landscapes of San Francisco come alive, but you might notice that the marine layer curls around the distant Golden Gate, weaving its mystique into the surroundings. The fog’s gentle presence, cloaked in the bay’s embrace, hints at all the stories waiting to be told. Engaging in a quiet moment at a panoramic viewpoint, with the city’s rhythm pulsing below, you might find yourself pondering the subtleties of life as the winds unfurl across the hills. It’s a morning to be absorbed by the simplicity of existence, where your surroundings harmoniously blend with your thoughts—ideal for exploration but tinged with the tranquil whisper of solitude.
